Title: Plan agent in VS Code
Author: Visual Studio Code
Description:
The plan agent in VS Code helps developers break down complex tasks step-by-step before any code is written. This video walks through a demo of how Plan helps to tackle a multi-step implementation, showing how you can refine the requirements before executing the plan.

Learn more: https://code.visualstudio.com/docs/copilot/chat/chat-planning#\_plan-agent-for-detailed-task-research
